headline: Will Copa Holdings' Operating Margin Continue to Be Robust in 2025?
summary: CPA maintains over 20% operating margin and projects it to be 21-23% for 2025, far outpacing other U.S. airline operators like DAL and AAL..

raw.headline: Will Copa Holdings' Operating Margin Continue to Be Robust in 2025?

headline: Delta Air Lines increases quarterly dividend 25% to 18.75c per share
summary: Delta Air Lines (DAL)’ board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of 18.75c per share, an increase of 25% over previous levels. The dividend is payable to shareholders of record as of the close of business on July 31 and will be paid on August 21, the company stated. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news.
